channel.title: SPZ Security & Breaking News Feed
channel.description: Breaking security news, military updates, and high-priority international alerts

item.title: [CRITICAL] What we know about the joint US-Israel attack on Iran
item.description: **CRITICAL**: Donald Trump has described "major combat operations", with explosions heard across Iran. Military action has begun - this is a major escalation. **Priority: 50/50**

item.title: [VIDEO/BREAKING] Smoke rises in Tehran as explosions heard across country
item.description: **BREAKING**: The BBC's Jon Donnison reports from Jerusalem as Trump says "major combat operations" have begun. VIDEO shows smoke rising over Tehran. **Priority: 50/50**

item.title: [BREAKING] Pakistan defence minister says country in 'open war' with Afghanistan after strikes
item.description: **BREAKING**: The latest attacks by Pakistan follow months of clashes between the two countries, despite agreeing to a fragile ceasefire in October. **Priority: 40/50**

item.title: [BREAKING] At least 15 killed after military plane carrying banknotes crashes in Bolivia
item.description: **BREAKING**: Police fire tear gas to disperse crowds allegedly trying to take banknotes from the crash site. **Priority: 40/50**

item.title: Aid groups in Gaza and West Bank thrown lifeline as Israel court pauses ban threat
item.description: Dozens of well-known groups faced shutdown under a new Israeli law, although the reprieve might be temporary. **Priority: 40/50**

item.title: 'They seized everything': Yemen's Houthi rebels drive aid groups to the brink
item.description: Aid groups - a lifeline for millions of Yemenis - are being squeezed out of existence in areas under the control of the rebels, the BBC hears. **Priority: 35/50**

item.title: [BREAKING] Tram derails in Milan, leaving two dead and dozens injured
item.description: **BREAKING**: The crowded tram was travelling in the centre of Milan at rush hour when it appeared to crash into the side of a building. **Priority: 35/50**

item.title: Drone jammed near French aircraft carrier was Russian, says Sweden
item.description: Sweden's prime minister said it was a serious but not unexpected incident - and a "Russian way of acting that we recognise from other places". **Priority: 35/50**

item.title: At least 55 Ghanaians killed in Russia-Ukraine war, minister says
item.description: This is the highest number of confirmed casualties from a single African country in the Ukraine-Russia war. **Priority: 30/50**
